metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6762 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the libziparchive library couldenable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code within thecontext of a privileged process. This issue is rated as High because itcould be used to gain local access to elevated capabilities, which are notnormally accessible to a third-party application. Product: Android.Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0. Android ID: A-31251826.

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
